title: sumachara janaka (thana thillAnA)
sahitya:
sumacara janaka su-hrdaya surapatinuta nA

anupallavi

 shramamula dIrccu kramamuna shrInivAsaghana

shorkkaTTu

tAmdhIm takaNaka jhaNutaka dhittillAnA nAdrutAni tOmdrutAni 
nAdrutAni druttillAnA tAnAdhiranA tOmdhrudhrudhru 
tillillAnA dhiranA dhiranA nAdrudru tomdrudru tomdrudrudru dhitlAm tAm kiTataka 
jhaNutaka tlAm tAm kiTataka jhaNutata tAm kiTataka jhaNutaka
